mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, SEX, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, USER_TYPE AS userType, MOBILE, EMAIL, STATUS, CREATOR_ID AS creatorId, CREATED_TIME AS createdTime FROM STM_SYS_USER where ID=#{id}

SELECT ID, NAME, SEX, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, USER_TYPE AS userType, MOBILE, EMAIL, STATUS, LOCK_TYPE AS lockType, LOCK_TIME AS lockTime, UP_PASS_TIME AS upPassTime, PASS_ERROR_CNT AS passErrorCnt FROM STM_SYS_USER where account=#{account}

SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM STM_SYS_USER where account=#{account}
AND ID != #{id}
mapper.update:
update STM_SYS_USER
NAME = #{name},
SEX = #{sex} ,
USER_TYPE = #{userType},
PASSWORD = #{password},
MOBILE = #{mobile} ,
EMAIL = #{email},
STATUS = #{status},
LOCK_TYPE = #{lockType},
LOCK_TIME = #{lockTime},
UP_PASS_TIME = #{upPassTime},
PASS_ERROR_CNT = #{passErrorCnt},
where ID = #{id}

update STM_SYS_USER
STATUS = #{status},
LOCK_TYPE = #{lockType},
LOCK_TIME = #{lockTime},
PASS_ERROR_CNT = #{passErrorCnt},
where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT OCUSER.ID, OCUSER.NAME AS name, OCUSER.SEX AS sex, OCUSER.USER_TYPE AS userType, OCUSER.MOBILE AS mobile, OCUSER.EMAIL AS email, OCUSER.ACCOUNT AS account, OCUSER.CREATOR_ID AS creatorId, OCUSER.CREATED_TIME AS createdTime, OCUSER.STATUS AS status FROM STM_SYS_USER OCUSER WHERE OCUSER.STATUS=1

SELECT OCUSER.ID, OCUSER.NAME AS name, OCUSER.SEX AS sex, OCUSER.USER_TYPE AS userType, OCUSER.MOBILE AS mobile, OCUSER.EMAIL AS email, OCUSER.ACCOUNT AS account, OCUSER.CREATOR_ID AS creatorId, OCUSER.CREATED_TIME AS createdTime, OCUSER.STATUS AS status FROM STM_SYS_USER OCUSER WHERE OCUSER.STATUS=1 AND OCUSER.USER_TYPE=#{userType}
mapper.insert:
insert into STM_USER_RESOURCE_REL(USER_ID, RESOURCE_ID, TYPE, DOMAIN_ID) values
(#{item.userId}, #{item.resourceId}, #{item.type}, #{item.domainId})

insert into STM_USER_RESOURCE_REL(USER_ID, RESOURCE_ID, TYPE, DOMAIN_ID)
(select #{item.userId}, #{item.resourceId}, #{item.type}, #{item.domainId} from dual)

insert into STM_USER_RESOURCE_REL(USER_ID, RESOURCE_ID, TYPE, DOMAIN_ID)
(select #{item.userId}, #{item.resourceId}, #{item.type}, #{item.domainId} from dual)

insert into STM_USER_RESOURCE_REL(USER_ID, RESOURCE_ID, TYPE, DOMAIN_ID)
(select #{item.userId}, #{item.resourceId}, #{item.type}, #{item.domainId} from dual)
mapper.delete:
delete from STM_USER_RESOURCE_REL where RESOURCE_ID in
#{resourceId}
mapper.select:
SELECT ID,NAME,SEX,ACCOUNT,PASSWORD,USER_TYPE userType,MOBILE,EMAIL,STATUS FROM STM_SYS_USER where 1=1
AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or ACCOUNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))

SELECT ID,NAME,SEX,ACCOUNT,PASSWORD,USER_TYPE userType,MOBILE,EMAIL,STATUS FROM STM_SYS_USER where 1=1
AND (NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' or ACCOUNT LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%')

SELECT ID,NAME,SEX,ACCOUNT,PASSWORD,USER_TYPE userType,MOBILE,EMAIL,STATUS FROM STM_SYS_USER where 1=1
AND (NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' or ACCOUNT LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%')

SELECT ID,NAME,SEX,ACCOUNT,PASSWORD,USER_TYPE userType,MOBILE,EMAIL,STATUS FROM STM_SYS_USER where 1=1
AND (NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' or ACCOUNT LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%')
select ID, NAME from STM_SYS_DOMAIN
select ID, NAME from STM_SYS_ROLE

select DOMAIN.ID as id, DOMAIN.NAME as name, ROLE.NAME as roleName from STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL REL left join STM_SYS_DOMAIN DOMAIN on REL.DOMAIN_ID=DOMAIN.ID left join STM_SYS_ROLE ROLE on REL.ROLE_ID=ROLE.ID where REL.USER_ID=#{userId}

select "DOMAI".ID as id, "DOMAI".NAME as name, ROL.NAME as roleName from STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL REL left join STM_SYS_DOMAIN "DOMAI" on REL.DOMAIN_ID=DOMAI.ID left join STM_SYS_ROLE ROL on REL.ROLE_ID=ROL.ID where REL.USER_ID=#{userId}

select distinct DOMAIN.ID as id, DOMAIN.NAME as name, 1 as adminUser from STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL REL left join STM_SYS_DOMAIN DOMAIN on REL.DOMAIN_ID=DOMAIN.ID where REL.USER_ID=#{userId} and REL.DOMAIN_ID not in (select distinct DOMAIN_ID FROM STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND ROLE_ID IN(1,2)) union select distinct DOMAIN.ID as id, DOMAIN.NAME as name, 2 as adminUser from STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL REL left join STM_SYS_DOMAIN DOMAIN on REL.DOMAIN_ID=DOMAIN.ID where REL.USER_ID=#{userId} and REL.DOMAIN_ID in (select distinct DOMAIN_ID FROM STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND ROLE_ID IN(1,2))

select distinct "DOMAI".ID as id, "DOMAI".NAME as name, 1 as adminUser from STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL REL left join STM_SYS_DOMAIN "DOMAI" on REL.DOMAIN_ID="DOMAI".ID where REL.USER_ID=#{userId} and REL.DOMAIN_ID not in (select distinct DOMAIN_ID FROM STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND ROLE_ID IN(1,2)) union select distinct "DOMAI".ID as id, "DOMAI".NAME as name, 2 as adminUser from STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL REL left join STM_SYS_DOMAIN "DOMAI" on REL.DOMAIN_ID="DOMAI".ID where REL.USER_ID=#{userId} and REL.DOMAIN_ID in (select distinct DOMAIN_ID FROM STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND ROLE_ID IN(1,2))

select distinct DOMAIN.ID as id, DOMAIN.NAME as name from STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL REL left join STM_SYS_DOMAIN DOMAIN on REL.DOMAIN_ID=DOMAIN.ID where REL.USER_ID=#{userId} and REL.DOMAIN_ID in (select distinct DOMAIN_ID FROM STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND ROLE_ID IN(1,2))

select distinct "DOMAI".ID as id, "DOMAI".NAME as name from STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL REL left join STM_SYS_DOMAIN "DOMAI" on REL.DOMAIN_ID="DOMAI".ID where REL.USER_ID=#{userId} and REL.DOMAIN_ID in (select distinct DOMAIN_ID FROM STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND ROLE_ID IN(1,2))
mapper.delete:
delete from STM_SYS_USER_DOMAIN_ROLE_REL where USER_ID in
#{userId}
mapper.select: select count(1) from STM_USER_RESOURCE_REL where RESOURCE_ID=#{resourceGroupId} and TYPE=2
mapper.update: UPDATE stm_sys_user SET PASS_ERROR_CNT = 0 WHERE STATUS = 1
UPDATE stm_sys_user SET UP_PASS_TIME = now() WHERE STATUS = 1
UPDATE stm_sys_user SET UP_PASS_TIME = sysdate WHERE STATUS = 1
UPDATE stm_sys_user SET UP_PASS_TIME = sysdate WHERE STATUS = 1
UPDATE stm_sys_user SET UP_PASS_TIME = sysdate WHERE STATUS = 1
